Posts.Content: Oct 29, 2007 01:14AM Alyx wrote: I'm doing some research for a presentation paper in my communications class on the petition for insurance companies to allow longer hospital stays after any breast cancer surgeries. Just trying to get an idea of how those who have gone through it feel about it and whether or not they felt they needed a longer stay or felt "pushed out" by their insurance companies.
Posts.Title: Average hospital stay for surgery? SusanB12 cmharris59
